name: Dictionary Inject
subtitle: 辞書-Inject
description: An HTML generator for making lists of dictionary entries and definitions for input on digital flashcards.

name: Kotowaza Bot
subtitle: ことわざ Bot
description: A Node.js twitter bot sending out small bits of Japanese wisdom every hour 24/7.

name: Daijirin Scraper
subtitle: 大辞林 スクレーパー
description: Successor to the Dictionary Inject app. A command-line web scraping tool for grabbing dictionary definitions that automatically parses the html of definition lists.

name: Bowling Calculator
description: Calculate the score of a bowling game. Complete with strikes, spares, and gutterballs.

name: The Budget App
description: Track your income and expenses for the month.
